definition: content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere
leisurely and free (idiom)/carefree and at ease

sentences.english: Everyone needs friendship. No one can sail the ocean of life single-handed.
sentences.chinese: 人人都需要友誼，沒有人能獨安閒人生的海洋中航行。

sentences.english: Let's enjoy a few hours of peace and quiet.
sentences.chinese: 我們一起享受些安閒平靜的時刻吧。

sentences.english: He doesn't like a life of leisure.
sentences.chinese: 他不喜歡過安閒的生活。

sentences.english: My parents are retired and now live a life of ease.
sentences.chinese: 我的父母都退休了，現在過着安閒舒適的生活。

sentences.english: Reflected adequately " free space, self-expression " design a concept.
sentences.chinese: 充分體現了“安閒空間，自我表現”的設計理念。
他散漫安閒地度過夏天。

sentences.english: I would like a centring room.
sentences.chinese: 我想要一間安閒一點的房間。

sentences.english: Of course, to have tea on behalf of wine, savor the leisurely calm in the warm environment.
sentences.chinese: 當然也有以茶代酒的，細細品味平靜之中的安閒。

sentences.english: It's a slow, ghd iv salon styler, peaceful life that I love with a surprisingly deep passion.
sentences.chinese: 我深深地酷愛着這種安閒而安靜的生活。

definition: to spend the whole day eating (i.e. not doing any work)
lit. to breathe out stale air and breathe in fresh (idiom, from Zhuangzi 庄子); fig. to get rid of the old and bring in the new
a calm heart keeps you cool (idiom)
